name: Rise n Time
description:
Ludum Dare Page --> https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/rise-n-time

---

Tomorrow is guaranteed to be the worst day of your life. There is only one solution.. never wake up for it! Dodge the alarms on your clocks to stay asleep, and delay the inevitable. This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50, Hope you enjoy it :)

TIC-80 uses this button mapping. Throughout this tutorial we'll use the "Action" button.

ActionKey (QWERTY) Up Up Arrow Down Down Arrow Left Left Arrow Right Right Arrow A Z B X X A Y S

Use the arrow keys to walk around.Hit A or B to jump over the alarm clocks rings.


and be careful not to fall off the edge!

Oh also you can hold down X or Y to exit back to the level select screen.
